pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor configuration 6 by SSCI.

content.raw:
Thanks for your help. I will be out of the office until Thursday, 5 December, but we are hoping to get this submission approved before the 11 December deadline for new submissions.

The model.sdf file that I submitted was modified from the model.sdf file in the `/.ignition/fuel/…/X4 Config 2/4/model.sd` that was downloaded from fuel when I first ran that configuration. Is it possible that I am getting the wrong sdf file from fuel?

In the `spawner.rb` file that you have posted it looks like the if statement for `_config==6` is gone and you have hard coded the `top_scan:=1` and the `bottom_scan:=1` in the executable command at the end of the file. Will this cause issues when using other configurations?
content.html:
Thanks for your help. I will be out of the office until Thursday, 5 December, but we are hoping to get this submission approved before the 11 December deadline for new submissions.

The model.sdf file that I submitted was modified from the model.sdf file in the /.ignition/fuel/…/X4 Config 2/4/model.sd that was downloaded from fuel when I first ran that configuration. Is it possible that I am getting the wrong sdf file from fuel?

In the spawner.rb file that you have posted it looks like the if statement for _config==6 is gone and you have hard coded the top_scan:=1 and the bottom_scan:=1 in the executable command at the end of the file. Will this cause issues when using other configurations?
